      • channels

        public UAudioProfile channels(int channels)
                       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        设置采样时的声道数
        Parameters:
        channels - 音频声道数CHANNEL_IN_MONO, CHANNEL_IN_STEREO.
        Returns:
        返回UAudioProfile对象
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - 设置的值不是CHANNEL_IN_MONO、CHANNEL_IN_STEREO时抛出

                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        设置音频PCM格式，当前仅支持pcm s16 bit

        Returns:
        UAudioProfile对象
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - 设置的值不是FORMAT_PCM_16BIT时抛出异常
